name: Tour of Manhattan
description:
Tour of Manhattan is a digital choose-your-own-adventure story intended for children ages 5 to 10. To begin, players enter their name and choose the character that looks most like them. For this prototype version of the game, we have developed five characters. We imagine a fully-realized version of the game to provide a much broader range of identities to choose from. 

Once your character is selected, you're off on your Big Apple adventure, choosing from four main activities that include visits to Times Square and the Statue of Liberty.

This game was created by Kate Womby Browne using Twine 2.2.1 in collaboration with artist Julia Womby. All images were either drawn by Julia or were sourced from Noun Project, with Photoshop work by Kate.

We hope you enjoy our light-hearted approach to customized digital storytelling and welcome your feedback!
